columns.name: service_namespace
columns.description: The namespace of the AWS service that provides the resource, or a custom-resource.

columns.name: resource_id
columns.description: The identifier of the resource associated with the scalable target.

columns.name: scalable_dimension
columns.description: The scalable dimension associated with the scalable target. This string consists of the service namespace, resource type, and scaling property.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The Unix timestamp for when the scalable target was created.

columns.name: min_capacity
columns.description: The minimum value to scale to in response to a scale-in activity.

columns.name: max_capacity
columns.description: The maximum value to scale to in response to a scale-out activity.

columns.name: role_arn
columns.description: The ARN of an IAM role that allows Application Auto Scaling to modify the scalable target on your behalf.

columns.name: suspended_state
columns.description: Specifies whether the scaling activities for a scalable target are in a suspended state.
